io.micronaut.configuration.kafka.embedded

Class KafkaEmbedded

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.configuration.kafka.embedded.KafkaEmbedded
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.context.event.BeanCreatedEventListener<AbstractKafkaConfiguration>, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.EventListener

    @Singleton
 @Requires(env={"test","dev"}) @Requires(classes={kafka.server.KafkaServer.class,org.I0Itec.zkclient.ZkClient.class,kafka.utils.TestUtils.class,org.apache.kafka.test.TestUtils.class}) @Requires(property="kafka.embedded.enabled")
public class KafkaEmbedded
extends java.lang.Object
implements io.micronaut.context.event.BeanCreatedEventListener<AbstractKafkaConfiguration>, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    This class will configure a Kafka server for the test environment if no server is already available.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
